item.description:
Artu (http://www.artuboston...) has a huge lunch menu to choose from. The food is delicious, the portions are large and the prices are affordable. The ranges are: Antipasti $4.50-13.50, Soups $4.50, Panini $6.50-8.50, Pizza $12-14, Salads $5.50-9.95, Pasta $9-12.50, Meat/Chicken/Fish $9.50-13.50. We'll sit in the dining room and begin reviewing the menu at 1:00. But for those who arrive between 12:00 and 1:00, please join us in the lounge for mingling and getting better acquainted. You've got to walk through the bar/lounge to get to the main dining room anyway. The restaurant is at 6 Prince St. As you walk down the right-hand side of Hanover St. from the Greenway, take a right onto Prince. Let's celebrate the New Year with a tasty Italian meal.

IMPORTANT: Please access our 'About' tab for further event guidelines.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be at the bar until 1:00.
item.name: Artu- Lunch
